plot: A group of young filmmakers are forced to deal with the most unexpected challenges when their attempts to shoot a feature in 6 days go awry, not knowing what awaits for them at the end.
title: The Last Time
plot_es: A group of young filmmakers are forced to deal with the most unexpected challenges when their attempts to shoot a feature in 6 days go awry, not knowing what awaits for them at the end.
plot_en: A group of young filmmakers are forced to deal with the most unexpected challenges when their attempts to shoot a feature in 6 days go awry, not knowing what awaits for them at the end.
